Title: Seamonkey: Multiple Vulnerabilities
Synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Seamonkey, the worst of which can lead to remote code execution.

Background.Text: The Seamonkey project is a community effort to deliver production-quality releases of code derived from the application formerly known as the ‘Mozilla Application Suite’.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Seamonkey. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All Seamonkey users should upgrade to the latest version:
